note.p: School principal and naturalist. Second son of Robert Walker Dixon and Susan Dixon. BA, London University, 1880. BA (Classics), Cambridge, 1883. Principal of a school for the deaf, Northampton, 1883–1910. Honorary secretary of the Northamptonshire Natural History Society, 1888; honorary member of the Cryptogamic Society of Scotland; of the Caradoc and Severn Field Club. Fellow of the Linnean Society, 1885.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/1777/90/1)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 16 April 2018)
